TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReferenceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter to convert object references to and from other representations.

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert object references to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常定位的组件或设计环境的上下文中使用。The is typically used within the context of sited components or a design environment. 而无需组件位置或可用，此转换器是几乎没有什么用处。Without a component site or a usable , this converter is of little use. 此转换器转换的实现的对象的引用接口，并显示在其属性**属性**窗口。This converter converts a reference of an object that implements the interface and displays its properties in the **Properties** window. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 决不要创建的实例类。You should never create an instance of the class. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 此类提供方法来检查是否可以将特定值添加到标准值集合。This class provides the method to check whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection. 如果您不想要添加到集合的值，重写此方法。If you do not want to add the value to the collection, override this method.

para.span: 重写方法时不希望将值添加到标准值集合。

span.span: Override the method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a reference object using the specified context.

span.span: if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常会将类型转换到和从字符串对象。This method most commonly converts types to and from string objects. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: is .
The conversion cannot be performed.

param.name: context
param.span: An that provides an additional context.

span.span: An that provides an additional context.
The value to check.

summary.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.

returns.span: if the value is allowed and can be added to the standard values collection; if the value cannot be added to the standard values collection.

span.span: if the value is allowed and can be added to the standard values collection; if the value cannot be added to the standard values collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用每个值都与此关联的类型匹配并为每个组件找到关联的类型。This method is called for each value that matches the type associated with this and for each component found that is of the associated type. 默认情况下，此方法返回`true`，也就是说，它允许将值添加到标准值集合。By default, this method returns `true`, that is, it allows adding the value into the standard values collection.

para.span: 当不希望将值添加到标准值集合时，重写此方法。

span.span: Override this method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.
